original_text: There was nothing in the ark except the two tablets of stone that Moses put there at Horeb, where the Lord made a covenant with the people of Israel, when they came out of the land of Egypt.
korean_text: 그 궤 안에는 두 돌판 외에 아무것도 없으니 이것은 이스라엘 자손이 애굽 땅에서 나온 후 여호와께서 저희와 언약을 맺으실 때에 모세가 호렙에서 그 안에 넣은 것이더라

sentences.original_text: There was nothing in the ark
except the two tablets of stone
that Moses put there at Horeb
where the Lord made a covenant
when they came out of the land of Egypt
